title: Removal of 'zombie cells' alleviates causes of diabetes in obese mice

title_detail.value: Removal of 'zombie cells' alleviates causes of diabetes in obese mice

summary: Researchers have shown that when senescent cells -- also known as 'zombie cells' -- are removed from fat tissue in obese mice, severity of diabetes and a range of its causes or consequences decline or disappear.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have shown that when senescent cells -- also known as 'zombie cells' -- are removed from fat tissue in obese mice, severity of diabetes and a range of its causes or consequences decline or disappear.
